Articles.Content:
The science in the new version is great! I think it is critical to have the ability to review what science you have already achieved... What Biomes have you taken the temperature on? What Biomes have you used with the Goo?... Did you get low orbit for some planet or moon after the fact, did you forget?

I think this is a VERY critical oversight. There should be some sort of log of all of the science you have researched... what percentage have you transmitted of the total possible? It should all be ordered in a way that makes it easy to review and not a simple chronological order.

If this already exists, I haven't seen it and I'd like to after several missions and starting to figure some things out... know what I've already achieved.

I hope Squad will release this soon too.

Until then, there is a nice mod designed by Synapse :

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53952-Research-Development-Overview-%2APermanent-Update-Thread

Very useful.
